```{ojs}

  multiple: true, 
  label: "County", 
  sort: true, 
  unique: true})
  
 islands
```


```{ojs}
filtered = data.filter(function(data) {
  return islands.includes(data.County);
})
```


```{ojs}

import { aq, op } from '@uwdata/arquero'
penguins = await aq.loadCSV('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/medewitt/covidcdc/main/output/nc-county-vax.csv')

```

```{ojs}
#| eval: true
viewof datUse = penguins
  //.filter(p => islands.includes(p.County))
  .groupby('County')
  .slice(0,intensity)
  .view(intensity);
```

```{ojs}
#| eval: true
Plot.plot({
  y: {
    grid: true,
    label: "Percent of Population Fully Vaccinated"
  },
  marks: [
```
